Name: Crusader C1 Spirit Wikelo Special
Description:
Manufacturer: Crusader Industries
Focus: Transport

Crusader Industries brings its usual commitment to excellence directly to the civilian market with the C1 Spirit, a mid-size multi-purpose starship built for cargo transport and delivery but packing enough versatility to tackle multiple roles and unpredictable jobs.

Wikelo here. Made useful modifications to make much more impressive.
